ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... across the street? No, you ... buddy. Then again, EQ is not life.  It s a game.  If you want real life, you don t need to turn on your computer.  But in a
ygData.messageBody:
> At similar levels we should have the same ability to compete.

>>Says who? Do you have the same starting point in life as the rich kid
across the street? No, you
>>don't. As I said, life is tough like that. EQ doesn't stand for equal,
buddy.

Then again, EQ is not life. It's a game. If you want real life, you don't
need to turn on your computer. But in a game, there's nothing that says
that at similar levels we shouldn't have the same ability to compete. This
is a judgment call.


----- Original Message -----
From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 12:05 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


> From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
>
> Rich Mulawa wrote:
>
> > From: Rich Mulawa <richard.mulawa@...>
> >
> > > You're just upset
> > > that she gets an advantage you didn't, right? Well, life is tough like
> > > that.
> >
> > Damn right I am upset.
>
> Awww.
>
> > I play a limited amount of time and I have to compete with everyone
else
> > in the game.
>
> Newsflash: no you don't. If you want to compete, fire up Half Life and
compete for frags. There's
> competition. EQ is not.
>
> > At similar levels we should have the same ability to compete.
>
> Says who? Do you have the same starting point in life as the rich kid
across the street? No, you
> don't. As I said, life is tough like that. EQ doesn't stand for equal,
buddy.
>
> > But with her
> > twinking I am at the disadvantage.
>
> No! You are where you would be anyway. She has some advantage, but it's
not an advantage OVER YOU.
> Unless you are playing on Rallos Zek or +pvp you are very misguided as to
the true nature of EQ.
>
> > While she coasts yet another character to the upper levels
> > AT MY EXPENSE!!
>
> How exactly is it at your expense?
>
> > Yes I am upset and yes she should be told to play fair like the rest of
us are
> > forced too.
>
> Yeah, it's time for a new order! A revolution! Kind of like 1917, right?
>
> "Red Norrath" does have a sound to it.
>
> >
> > > Well, life is tough like
> > > that. Whether she gets an advantage or not, is none of your business
> > > because it doesn't really affect you.
> >
> > It does affect me. It makes that many fewer creatures at my level
available for me to kill in
> > an HONORABLE way.
>
> Oh, come on! Are you saying you're having difficulty to find kills because
of twinkers? The % of
> twinkers in the game is probably 5-10 MAX. Norrath is crowded, no doubt,
but don't blame twinkers
> for hunting hardships.
>
> > This makes my job (an already difficult one) even more difficult and
that is
> > why twinking is the WORST POSSIBLE OFFENSE.
> >
>
> Uh, no. Don't you find kill stealing or Guild camping worse? Man, it looks
like you're really fired
> up about this, eh?
>
> Listen, if you're on Solusek Ro, I might help you out, you know? Would
10-20pp help the revolution?
>
> >
> > > And remember, she had to work her
> > > way to level 22 before that as well, so she is only giving her other
> > > Char something she rightfully earned.
> >
> > And just WHAT is your point? Because she has one character at a high
level and can play in
> > areas that I cannot she has somehow earned the right to retard my low
level characters
> > development (see above) making it even more difficult for me to get to
my "rightfully earned"
> > 22nd level.
> >
>
> As I said, the twinker's affect on hunting is negligible, at best. Can you
prove the contrary?
>
> >
> > You are obviously a fool
>
> Obviously. I bow before your superior intellect, mighty one.
>
> > and most likely a twinker. I can only hope you are not on my server.
> >
>
> Hah. I'm level 13, and I have 60pp in the bank. All rightfully earned. I
can hardly play enough with
> one character, let alone two or more.
>
> Ever hear the phrase "I might disagree with your opinion, but I'll fight
to the death to let you
> voice it"? Well this is the same. I might frown upon twinkers, but I'll do
anything to preserve
> their freedom to do as they wish.
>
> Do you disagree, comrade?
>
> --
> Qenelin
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
>
